title: Lal Isua Chhandamtu
lyrics:
Lal Isua, Chhandamtu,
Mi sual tana thi;
Chak lova khenbeh chu,
Chaknain a tho.
Danglam tawh lo turin,
Pa hnenah a cheng,
Chawimawina malsawmna,
Kumkhuain a chang.

Awmkhawhar zan tlaiah
Zuitu leng khawm chuan,
Chau leh ngui tak chungin,
Amah an hmu ta.
Chutin khua lo ngui hian,
Kan zingah chengin,
Thutak min hriattir la,
Kan thinlung enin.

Pindan chungnungah khan,
Zuituhote chuan,
Lungngaih mangan laiin,
Nang chu an hmu che.
Khua tlai thinlung ngui hi,
Min tiharh ang che;
'In chungah thlamuanna,
Thleng rawh se,' tiin.
